references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of expectation over transformation attacks, which inspired the training method used in NeuralFuse for generating error-resistant data representations.

references.paper_title: Resilient low voltage accelerators for high energy efficiency
references.reason: This paper provides crucial background on the effects of undervolting on SRAM and its impact on DNN accuracy, which forms the basis for the problem addressed by NeuralFuse.

references.paper_title: Eyeriss: A spatial architecture for energy-efficient dataflow for convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper provides insights into energy-efficient hardware architectures for DNNs, which is relevant to understanding the energy consumption NeuralFuse seeks to improve.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces ResNet architectures, a prominent model used extensively in the experiments of NeuralFuse to validate its performance.

references.paper_title: Learning multiple layers of features from tiny images
references.reason: This paper introduces the CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 datasets, which are primary datasets used in NeuralFuse experiments to evaluate accuracy.
